title: What serif to pair with Dosis (a condensed rounded sans)?
content:
What serif to pair with Dosis (a condensed rounded sans)?

Here is a link to Dosis  
http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/dosis?q[term]=dosis&q[search\_check]=Y
author: pers0n

comments.content:
I ask this because Dosis is free:  
Does the matching font also have to be free?

hhp
What Hrant says. Also, intended use? (headlines/body text; subject matter; web/print; etc.)
